name: EntityMobGriefingEvent
description: EntityMobGriefingEvent is fired when mob griefing is about to occur and allows an event listener to specify whether it should or not. This event is fired when ever the mobGriefing game rule is checked. This event has a result : Event.Result.ALLOW means this instance of mob griefing is allowed. Event.Result.DEFAULT means the mobGriefing game rule is used to determine the behaviour. Event.Result.DENY means this instance of mob griefing is not allowed. This event is fired on the MinecraftForge.EVENT_BUS .
